servinfo.title: DTC P0112 / P0113: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit Low / High Input

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0111: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit Performance .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0112: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit Low Input

entry.ptxt: Circuit voltage of IAT sensor is less than 0.16 V for 5 seconds or longer. (1 driving cycle detection logic)

ptxt.emph: P0113: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit High Input

entry.ptxt: Circuit voltage of IAT sensor is more than 5.0 V for 5 seconds or longer. (1 driving cycle detection logic)

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC by using scan tool if any.
Start engine and run it for 10 sec.
Check DTC by using scan tool.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions for DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from IAT sensor and ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to IAT sensor and ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that IAT sensor circuit is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each IAT sensor signal and ground circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance of IAT sensor signal circuit is infinity between IAT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between IAT sensor signal terminal and each other terminal at MAF and IAT sensor connector.
Circuit voltage of each IAT sensor signal and ground circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned ON.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Check that IAT sensor signal voltage is 5 V between IAT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.

action.ptxt: Substitute a known good ECM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Check IAT sensor for performance referring to Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known good ECM and recheck.
